name: CogArray
summary: This object stores bunch of other objects

$<method name>.summary: Runs method with method name provided after $ in this method's name with provided args

get.summary: Returns element from array in provided index

remove.summary: Removes array element with provided index

logMe.summary: Logs this CogMaster object in minecraft logs

toString.summary: Same as running Cogwheel.str passing this object as argument

equals.summary: Check if provided object equals to this object
